ModMetaData.name: Tribal Masks For All
ModMetaData.author: Copper Boltwire
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.0.0.0 For v1.1+
Makes tribal masks universal, so Tribal and civilized can use them.
Using the patch system, I simply just 'nuked' the "factionPrerequisiteTags" from the object.
Load Order: Last - Just in case.
Compatibility: 'should' not conflict with a darn thing... it's a patch mod that kills a tag from a def. By loading it last, it ensures full compatibility.
